documents.document: @Collectorgalaxy @justinseeley looking forward to following the hunt for Boba. Good luck.
@justinseeley really enjoying the latest episode of @Collectorgalaxy Almost walked into traffic listening to the rocket firing boba story!
The only good thing about the Pro Bowl is seeing the teams lined up with their team helmets on. Looks kinda cool.
@jd_burge @TheMichaelNipp @davedollar @RemodelingClay that might actually have been better!
@TheMichaelNipp @davedollar @RemodelingClay @jd_burge have any of you fellas seen Exposed with Keanu Reeves?
@docllv @MileHighReport better yet, I made it to Mile High in 94 for last ever visit of LA Raiders. Disn't go well either.
@docllv @MileHighReport I've had to watch NYG, Skins, 49ers & Seahawks beatdowns at about 3am. Refused to go to bed until FT
@docllv @MileHighReport First pass of that game. Deep sideline to Nattiel (I think). Thought we were going to win that one. How wrong 😏
@Sydark71 apparently you can play it on Tabletop Simulator via Steam as well.
@Sydark71 think he was considering ordering tomorrow
@Sydark71 Exposed with Keanu Reeves. Sounded like a straight up cop's partner is killed thriller. Some weird shit happening.
Me watching a movie right now https://t.co/vG0wV8c24x
@TheMichaelNipp ah, ok. Don't feel so dumb now. Country music doesn't really reach us here.
@TheMichaelNipp Red Cup? What's it all mean? What's the play on words here? Asking for a friend.
@scubedpod very enjoyable. Had to stop at Rebels as I haven't seen it yet. The Jyn/Rogue One chat was great.
@RemodelingClay haha that's all I'll see now.
@RemodelingClay would quite like a Lions one too to be honest. Always liked that logo.
@RemodelingClay I shall seek it out. Hoping this bad boy is my next one https://t.co/tPOtFAsFBi
@RemodelingClay The U, Stanford (Elway connection) and FSU.
@RemodelingClay ah, got you. I like that cap. I have a thing for caps. Have about two dozen at home. Only got 3 college caps
@RemodelingClay I'd take a stab at 'yes' being the right answer though, given your location.
@RemodelingClay I don't really follow baseball, sorry. NFL is my US sport. Watched some hockey when I could see it but not for a while now
@RemodelingClay as a kid outwith Star Wars and the other obvious ones.
@RemodelingClay agree on Point Break too. May as well throw Ghostbusters in there as well. Red Dawn and Ice Pirates were two I watched a lot
@RemodelingClay I wonder if it subconsciously steered (pardon the pun) me towards the Broncos a few years later? 🤔
@RemodelingClay was the original set in Colorado?
@RemodelingClay kinda why I avoided it. The characters all looked very "Twilighty" to me so 10 mins was as much as I could take
@RemodelingClay ...tourist eyes seeing tree lined streets with big houses that have screen doors and porches. Prob nothing like Boulder 😀
@RemodelingClay nice. I've seen about ten mins of it and the leafy streets I saw reminded me of Boulder, CO but I suspect part of that is...
@RemodelingClay oh really? Cool. (Not the movie). Where is that?
@RemodelingClay man I love Red Dawn. That's a great movie. "Wolverines!"
Time to go for a walk and listen to @scubedpod
@StarWarsScots @StarWarsUK I'd go stormtrooper (Snowtrooper if I could pick any). Not ready for the 'enhancements' of the Death trooper
@TheDeucecast @shazbazzar ahhh, my bad. Great show. Like the Rogue One discussion a lot.
@shazbazzar you were meaning Mt. Tantiss on @TheDeucecast right? It was in the Thrawn trilogy.
@StarWarsScots Coruscant is ok. The Republic capital planet goes to the home system of the sitting Supreme Chancellor so 000 is ok for now
@TheMichaelNipp the footage from the Trump rally made me feel ill.
@TheMichaelNipp 13th was excellent. Quite scary throughout but really interesting. Birth of a Nation looks utterly horrifying!
@TheMichaelNipp @TheDeucecast this will be my 7th title I've seen in January for the first time. Ticking along nicely so far.
@TheMichaelNipp @TheDeucecast plus my wife is out of town for a few days and will want to see Spotlight now I think about it.
@TheMichaelNipp @TheDeucecast as I'm in Netflix 13th wins. Spotlight is on Amazon. Too lazy to change apps 😁
@Webster_YNWA @JimSpenceSport Worked for them myself, as did my Mum. I held the trolley record for the Victoria St, Perth store 🎉🏆
@TheDeucecast need some help. Should I watch Place Beyond the Pines, Spotlight, 13th or Dawn of the Planet of the Apes?
@Jeff_Reinebold it's in the bag, Coach. https://t.co/FhrNFZVHTB
Cool. Looks like the Trade Federation droid control ships. https://t.co/4YKzYZ69Q0
@no1stuntmaster brilliant isn't it. Been one of my favourite shows of recent years. Felt like it was made just for me.
@Inselaffe76 that's my wer cousin that wrote that.
@MikeTarkin @sandcrawlercast do another one! Get Tom Berges on! For Jedha! Another exclamation mark!
This is pretty cool. https://t.co/kCizUUMyps
@StarWarsScots Palps could have killed him any time he liked. He needed Anakin to see him losing and 'save' him to aid his turning him
@pablohidalgo pop over to Scotland some day 👍
My daughter did a quick FN-2187 sketch earlier. https://t.co/3TASmJK29T
@jd_burge I remember a delegation of Cree visiting the Scottish Parliament a few tears ago so definitely a connection there somewhere.
@jd_burge yeah, I think so too. When I read there were Koreans, Chinese etc fighting the Allies on D-Day I couldn't believe it.
@jd_burge one of my ancestors apparently became a Chief of the Cree tribe (think it was Cree anyway). I'd like to find out more about that.
@jd_burge never is when it goes against message though. You never here about the non-whites from WW1/2 really but there were plenty fighting
@ArkhamAsylumDoc it saddens me every day I hear this talk. Humans should be better than this.
@ArkhamAsylumDoc the thing people who protest about immigrants in the US/UK forget is that almost all of us can be traced back to immigrants
@joemcalinden oooh. Is there perhaps gig news afoot?
@sandcrawlercast @DengarDan @CollectorsHutt really looking forward to this one
@jontlewis 9 white Sy dupes if you want them. Not sure what to request in trade so offer whatever you fancy giving up. Stevemcg in the app
@jd_burge @blackvoices I first learned of the true colour of the west in a small museum in Glenwood Springs, CO. In 94. It was fascinating
@Gbodancer Official twitter quoting me. A game late though. https://t.co/pnVdSXX5DQ
@skageek nice. I have a maroon jacket like that. Also have a Harrington. Love my Harrington. Desert boots in my wardrobe too.
Now well into S4 if The Clone Wars. A few filler episodes but in the midst of a decent few eps with Pong Krell.
@CoffeeWthKenobi @Fandango sitting on 6. Hoping I can squeeze one more in.
@TheMichaelNipp @TheDeucecast haha no they still show those on primetime BBC!
@TheDeucecast @TheMichaelNipp well Jake the Snake was excellent. Sad news is UK Netflix has no 30 for 30s
@TheDeucecast @TheMichaelNipp I'll check when this is finished. Really hope they are there.
@TheMichaelNipp don't believe so. Our Netflix is like the cousin the family would rather forget. Not too bad for TV but pretty bad for films
@TheMichaelNipp @TheDeucecast I wish I had a service that showed 30 for 30. Only ever seen the one on The U. It was brilliant.
@TheMichaelNipp @TheDeucecast really great so far. Used to be a big wrestling fan back in the 80s. Remember that Steamboat match clearly.
Choking up here #JaketheSnake Damn you @TheDeucecast !!
@RitchTweets he was immense. That Broncos squad was unbelievable. Elway, Sharpe, Smith, McCaffrey, Romocop, Neal Smith et al
Aww man Jake the Snake is wearing a Raiders jacket. BAD JAKE!
This record could stand for a long time. #TDforNFLHoF https://t.co/KB5rORoMGK
If Butch 'The Natural' Reed with his natural blonde hair isn't in it though, I may boycott @TheDeucecast 😉
Watching the Jake the Snake documentary. Another @TheDeucecast tip.
@JoeyWanKenobi one that I didn't have. Weren't many, but that is one of them.
@skageek maybe at my Mum's somewhere. I was a ten year old Mod 😊
@skageek you'll have to let me know what songs are standing out for you from what you've heard
@skageek used to go to school in the 70a with my fishtail parka with The Jam and The Who painted on it.
@skageek aww, nice. My favourite band of all-time. The album All Mod Cons is a masterpiece.
@skageek used to love how the guy in the 'Don't Speak' video had on a Jam t-shirt. Guy had taste.
Tip 1. If New England is playing you support the NFC team. 😉😭😭 https://t.co/TfD2BPSKM0
@StarWarsScots you got that right!
Like Star Wars Funko Pops? Give @FunkoSWGuide a follow. This man knows his stuff. RTs appreciated.
@AndrewinBelfast definitely. Haven't seen the second one.
@AndrewinBelfast I have an Odeon card so have been six times! Yeah, Monsters was ace. Remember seeing him on BBC breakfast talking about it
@AndrewinBelfast I've pretty much only seen Rogue One since December.
@TomBrogan @FraserC69 it got so bad in one nightmare my primary school slid back like the pool at Tracey Island and the missiles flew
@AndrewinBelfast he more or less re-used in Rogue One?
@AndrewinBelfast I liked them both, but Godzilla more. Lucy was a better idea than what I saw though. Dis you spot the two shots in Godzilla
@TGGamingReviews hell yes 🤘
@TomBrogan @FraserC69 please, no Threads mentions. I had nightmares for months after I watched that.
@claireherting @teamcovenant they look very cool.
@TomBrogan Coisty! Pity that $#%|!|€!~ Sandy Clark is there. I do not like that guy. Selling Danny Griffin. What an eejit 😉
Nice! Cheers Tom. Genuinely 3 of my favourite Saintees in the one on the left. @JimMorton10 is a legend 👍 https://t.co/fGelg4AilQ
@AndrewinBelfast @SW_Prequels yeah, ok. Or go Celtic (with a k sound) Jedi
@AndrewinBelfast @SW_Prequels One begs to differ 😉 https://t.co/fHOGd5sgFk
